main.div:
From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
File
File history
File usage
Global file usage
Size of this PNG preview of this SVG file: 360 × 341 pixels. Other resolutions: 253 × 240 pixels | 507 × 480 pixels | 811 × 768 pixels | 1,081 × 1,024 pixels | 2,162 × 2,048 pixels.
Original file ‎(SVG file, nominally 360 × 341 pixels, file size: 56 KB)
This is a file from the Wikimedia Commons. Information from its description page there is shown below.
Commons is a freely licensed media file repository. You can help.
Summary
DescriptionSpearman fig1.svg
English: Scatterplot comparing Spearman and Pearson correlation.
Date
18 December 2009
Source
Own work
Author
Skbkekas
SVG development
InfoField
The SVG code is valid.
This plot was created with Matplotlib.
Source code
InfoField
Python code
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt import numpy as np
X = np.random.uniform(size=100)
Y = np.log(X/(1-X))
Y = np.sign(Y)*np.abs(Y)**1.4
cc = np.cov(X,Y) cc = cc[0,1]/np.sqrt(cc[0,0]*cc[1,1])
plt.clf() plt.figure(figsize=(4,3.8)) plt.axes([0.17,0.12,0.8,0.75]) plt.plot(X, Y, 'o', color='orange') plt.grid(True) plt.title("Spearman correlation=1\nPearson correlation=%.2f" % cc) plt.xlabel("X", size=16) plt.ylabel("Y", size=16) plt.xlim(-0.05,1.05) plt.savefig("spearman_fig1.pdf") plt.savefig("spearman_fig1.svg")
Licensing
